Name: wikirace_benchmark
Title: WikiRace Benchmark: Measuring LLM’s World Knowledge and Reasoning Ability
Experiment: Develop a benchmark where LLMs solve WikiRaces by navigating between Wikipedia articles through internal links. Evaluate the model's ability to connect topics, choose efficient paths, and demonstrate world knowledge. The LLM is tasked with finding the shortest or fastest route between two specified articles while simulating human-like exploration.

Name: heuristic_search
Title: Heuristic Search for Efficient Wikipedia Navigation: Evaluating A* Algorithm
Experiment: Implement the A* search algorithm within the WikiGraph class. Define heuristics based on Wikipedia meta-data such as the number of outlinks, article length, and category similarity. Compare the performance of A* search with the existing BFS implementation in terms of path length and time taken. Evaluate the impact of these heuristics on the performance.
